meaningMnemonic: You have to <radical>run</radical>, put your <radical>ear</radical> on the <radical>stool</radical>, then run back. That's the <kanji>charm</kanji> of this game.
readingMnemonic: The added <kanji>charm</kanji> of this game is that there's this big <reading>chu</reading>te (しゅ) at the end. It's so charming because you love chutes.
